Message.Msg: what a laugh .... investors , analysts and who knows who , has been after IBM to breakup for about 40 years now .... of course , there is untold wealth for shareholders if IBM were to be split up .. ain't never gonna happen , especially , in light of the company's performance once LG got his hands on the situation .. IBM will continue to reinvent itself .. over the years , Big Blue has sold off lots of operations ... the proceeds never go to shareholders , but back in the coffers to fund new projects , or service some debt .... they have also bought hundreds of small companies to assist with growth into new areas ... a breakup would nice for shareholders , but don't look for it ....

Topic.Title: Executive AGE - top dogs getting old ......are your worried ????

Message.Msg: why do you guys continue with this claptrap ??? all it does is tie up resources , which in turn make things more expensive .. at whose gain ??? 15 nanoseconds of thrill when you hit the "post" button .. try getting a life .. it's very exciting ....
do you have a point to make ??? like maybe IBM is driving yet another competitor out of business ????
